casebody.data:
Kornegay Family Farms, LLC, et al.
v.
Cross Creek Seed, Inc. 187PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 6, 2017 L. Neal Ellis, Jr., Attorney at Law, Wake Forest, J. P. Williamson, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Kornegay Family Farms, LLC, et al. Steven B. Epstein, Attorney at Law, Caitlin Goforth, Attorney at Law, Saad Gul, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cross Creek Seed, Inc. Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys. Jon Ward, Attorney at Law, Michael W. Patrick, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Phillip Jacob Parker, Jr., Attorney at Law, H. Julian Philpott, Jr., Attorney at Law, for N.C. Farm Bureau Federation, Inc., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 5th of January 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of January 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 31st day of January 2017 to file and serve his/her reply brief with this Court.
